hero.title: Your project starts with LAD...
hero.title2: Where clients meet a select group of contractors and engineers
hero.description: We provide you with a secure and professional space that connects you directly with the best specialized contractors and engineers in all fields. Easily request your project, transparently compare bids and prices, and choose the most suitable option to execute your idea with the highest quality and least effort. LAD... your trusted partner to build your projects with confidence and peace of mind.

features.title: Diverse Features and Endless Possibilities
features.description: A unified platform that enables individuals, companies, and contractors to collaborate and grow.
features.feature1Description: We provide you with a reliable database of contractors in various fields, with ratings and reviews from previous clients to help you choose the best fit for your project.
features.feature2Description: We follow up on project stages and coordinate between the client and the contractor, ensuring clear requirements and deadlines for delivering high-quality work.
features.feature3Description: We help you draft contracts and guarantee the rights of all parties, in addition to managing payment processes in a safe and reliable way.

aboutUs.title: Everything About LAD
aboutUs.description: Our company aims to achieve customer satisfaction where our strategy and policies are the constant pursuit of customer satisfaction in the execution of our projects in terms of quality, deadlines, and during the project implementation stages.

howItWorks.title: How does LAD work ?
howItWorks.description: After creating your user account, you can upload your project details. The site will then match your request with qualified contractors and display the offers submitted to you. You can compare bids and negotiate with contractors.
howItWorks.step1Description: Choose the type of service you need and add your project details with photos and the expected budget.
howItWorks.step2Description: Qualified contractors will submit their competitive and professional offers for your project.
howItWorks.step3Description: Review the offers and previous ratings, then choose the contractor that best fits your needs.
howItWorks.step4Description: Follow the project's execution step by step with contractor ratings and full

browseProjects.title: Browse Projects
browseProjects.name: Ahmed Construction Company for General Construction
browseProjects.description: Experienced contractor with over 15 years of experience in general construction. Specialized in project execution.

appFeatures.title: App Features
appFeatures.description: Browse contractor profiles and ratings to choose the best fit for your project.
appFeatures.feature1Description: Available on all stores and can be downloaded easily
appFeatures.feature3Description: Secure and reliable payment and can be paid easily
appFeatures.feature4Description: Easy browsing with easy use and can review notifications and offers easily

testimonials.title: Trusted by Professionals in Construction & Engineering
testimonials.description: LAD brings together contractors, engineers, suppliers, and clients in one place. Here’s what professionals are saying about the platform.

testimonial1.quote: LAD helped me find reliable suppliers and connect with engineers much faster. The platform made project management far easier.
testimonial1.name: Ahmed Khaled

testimonial2.quote: As a freelance engineer, LAD gave me access to clients and contractors who truly value my skills. It’s a real gateway to opportunities.
testimonial2.name: Mona El-Sayed

testimonial3.quote: Thanks to LAD, I expanded my business and started supplying materials directly to contractors and offices. The platform saves time and builds trust.
testimonial3.name: Hassan Ali

testimonial4.quote: Finding the right contractor for my home project was easy with LAD. The process was clear, fast, and transparent.
testimonial4.name: Sara Mohamed

testimonial5.quote: Thanks to LAD, I expanded my business and started supplying materials directly to contractors and offices. The platform saves time and builds trust.
testimonial5.name: Hassan Ali

testimonial6.quote: Finding the right contractor for my home project was easy with LAD. The process was clear, fast, and transparent.
testimonial6.name: Sara Mohamed

testimonial7.quote: Thanks to LAD, I expanded my business and started supplying materials directly to contractors and offices. The platform saves time and builds trust.
testimonial7.name: Hassan Ali
